settings.replaceKeywordwithTag: Remove extracted paragraph keyword with end tag
settings.replaceKeywordwithTagDescriptio: Removes the tag/keyword from the extracted paragraph and adds it as a hashtag at the combined note end.
settings.tagNameDescription: Hashtag or keyword used within the paragraphs.
settings.tagPrefixDescription: Prefix for hashtags or any custom tags.
settings.preserveSourceNoteTitlesDescrip: Behält die Titel der Orginal Notizen bei, indem diese im Notiztext eingefügt werden.
settings.combinedNoteTitleCustomDescript: Benutzerdefinierter Titel, zu verfügung stehende Variablen: %s
